name: SonicAllStars.EXE Remastered
description:
Introducing a brand new Sonic the Hedgehog titl-

Sonic Mania Plus is what everyone knew

Take on an amazing variety of returning zones, as well as origina-

But did you know that there are things THEY didn't want you seeing?

5 playable characters, one epic adventure! The ultimate celebration of past and-

Of course, not everything can be kept a secret forever, you know.

Now, an old set of remasters are coming back...

In the style of Sonic Mania...

8 playable characters, many stages to play through, many games to enjoy...

And soon, your soul will join many others on my list!

There's nothing you can do to win, no matter how hard you try!

Search for the Black Rings and Dark Red Rings to uncover many secrets, but if you can't, too bad for you!

Ready for another All-Star Remaster?

Brought to you by GoldCodeX

(This game a major WIP. As the progress keeps going, the story is expanding with certain new features. As such, bugs can occur.)
